attributes.action: Allow personal memorials in the Garden Of Remembrance @ Manchester Crematorium
attributes.additional_details: This is a place where people go to feel close to loved ones and it used to be such a beautiful place, with pictures, cards, personal tributes. We pay for these trees so why can we not use them to pay tribute to our loved ones. It’s disgusting how everyone’s personal possessions have been treated and totally disrespected the deceased and their families.
attributes.background: Earlier this year ALL personal memorials were removed from the garden of remembrance WITHOUT warning and dumped at the back of the gardens. All just thrown in without any compassion or respect!! We would like this decision to be overturned to allow personal memorials on our trees that we pay for.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the individual organisation who manage the site, not the UK Government or Parliament.
